'''ANGWA''' or '''ANGU''' are [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|roots]] signifying "snake".<ref name=LR349>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 349</ref>

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[ango]]'';<ref name=LR349/> ''[[angulóke]]'' ("dragon")<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 370</ref>
*[[Noldorin]] ([[Sindarin]]): ''am-'' (as in ''[[amlug]]'', "dragon")<ref name=LR349/>
